TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContentByQueryWebPart extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.WebControls.CmsDataFormWebPart implements class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.IWebPartVariationUpdate, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class ContentByQueryWebPart Inherits CmsDataFormWebPart Implements IWebPartVariationUpdate

Docs.summary: A Web Part object that is used to retrieve dynamic information.

remarks.para: A ContentByQueryWebPart object uses the CrossListQueryCache object to retrieve data. The data retrieved is cleaned and then sent to the XSLT engine. The XSLT engine uses the defaultHeader.xsl, defaultItem.xsl, and defaultMain.xsl files to translate the data into HTML markup that is presented to the user. You can customize the HTML output of the ContentByQueryWebPart by using the XSL transform. The DataProcessDelegate allows you to retrieve data to be modified before it is sent to the XSLT engine. If the P property of this Web Part is specified, the data is not retrieved and the specified data is used instead. The ContentByQueryWebPart object derives from the object that caches XSLT transforms.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the CommonViewFields property for this object.
Docs.value: Additional fields for use by the ContentQueryWebPart object.

remarks.para: CommonViewFields are additional fields that you can request when retrieving data. You can format the fields as either "internalName" or "Guid", separated by semicolons. You can specify the field types by placing a comma after the internal name or the GUID.

Docs.summary: Data to use for the XSL transform.
Docs.value: Data to use for the XSL transform.

remarks.para: Setting this property to Null causes the Web Part to retrieve the data.
Setting this property to a data table causes the Web Part to use the data provided.

remarks.para: Column renames are separated by semicolons and are in the format "originalName,newName."
A new Column name must not be present in the data or the rename is not performed,

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ListGuid { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the List GUID.

remarks.para: The WebUrl property determines the ContentByQueryWebPart object's mode is determined by the WebUrl, , and properties.

item.description: If the WebUrl, ListGuid, and ListName properties are set, the mode is List.
If the WebUrl is set and ListGuid and ListName are empty, the mode is Web.
If WebUrl, ListGuid and ListName are empty, the mode is Site Collection.
If both ListGuid and ListName properties are set, ListGuid takes precedence.

If WebUrl, ListGuid and ListName are empty, the mode is Site Collection.
If both ListGuid and ListName properties are set, ListGuid takes precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WebUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the server-relative URL of the Web site.

remarks.para: The WebUrl property determines the ContentByQueryWebPart object's mode is determined by the WebUrl, , and properties.

item.description: If the WebUrl, ListGuid, and ListName properties are set, the mode is List.
If the WebUrl is set and ListGuid and ListName are empty, the mode is Web.
If WebUrl, ListGuid and ListName are empty, the mode is Site Collection.
